languages.text: "Бедолага. Уверен{mf||а}, в твоем плену его не ждет ничего хорошего".
"That poor soul. Surely nothing good awaits him in captivity."
languages.original_text: "Бедолага. Уверен{mf||а}, в твоем плену его не ждет ничего хорошего".

traits.locale_text: "What a wretched soul. I imagine nothing good awaits him in this captivity."
"What a wretched soul. I imagine nothing good awaits him in this captivity."
"That poor soul. Surely nothing good awaits him in captivity."
"That poor soul. Surely nothing good awaits him in captivity."
"That poor soul. Surely nothing good awaits him in captivity."
"That poor soul. Surely nothing good awaits him in captivity."

languages.text: « Le pauvre. Rien de bon ne l'attend en captivité. »
languages.original_text: "That poor soul. Surely nothing good awaits him in captivity."

traits.locale_text: « Le pauvre. Rien de bon ne l'attend en captivité. »

languages.text: “那个可怜的灵魂，囚禁他是没有好处的。”
languages.original_text: "That poor soul. Surely nothing good awaits him in captivity."

traits.locale_text: “那个可怜的灵魂，囚禁他是没有好处的。”

languages.text: "Die arme Seele. Gewiss erwartet ihn in Gefangenschaft nichts Gutes."
languages.original_text: "That poor soul. Surely nothing good awaits him in captivity."

traits.locale_text: "Die arme Seele. Gewiss erwartet ihn in Gefangenschaft nichts Gutes."

languages.original_text: "That poor soul. Surely nothing good awaits him in captivity."

languages.text: 「哀れだな。捕らわれの身では、良いことなど何もないだろう」
languages.original_text: "That poor soul. Surely nothing good awaits him in captivity."

traits.locale_text: 「哀れだな。捕らわれの身では、良いことなど何もないだろう」

languages.text: "Zavallı şey. Tutsaklıkta onu hoş şeylerin beklemediğine eminim."
languages.original_text: "That poor soul. Surely nothing good awaits him in captivity."

traits.locale_text: "Zavallı şey. Tutsaklıkta onu güzel şeyler beklemiyordur eminim."
